data.name: NONOGRAM - KAWAII CUTIES
data.detailed_description:
This game, called "NONOGRAM", is a logic puzzle that correctly fills the squares from the given hints.

Features
  • Solve the puzzles and complete the "cute" picture!
  • 6 "cute" pictures and 60 puzzles in total
  • Easy to hard puzzles, from 5x5 to 25x25
  • Mouse and game controllers are supported.


Notice
  • The graphics and musics in this game are used with official permission.

License
  • Powered by "CRIWARE".CRIWARE is a trademark of CRI Middleware Co., Ltd.

data.short_description: This game, called "NONOGRAM", is a logic puzzle that correctly fills the squares from the given hints. Solve the puzzles and complete the "cute" picture!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Thai, Turkish, Portuguese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
